lesson: Asynchronous fan-out + deterministic merge; temperature=0 at merge.
Capture minority view; trigger external validation at consensus>0.88.

topic: Generic CAMS chat-based ensemble system: design + ops + monitoring
objectives: Describe end-to-end system; produce prompts, merge rules, monitoring JSON; post-merge scripts
lesson: Asynchronous merge-before-consensus; enforce deterministic meta-merge; cache poisoning guard; here-strings + single-quoted commits.
guardrails: Use here-strings with @' / '@ at col 1 in PowerShell
Include memory index URLs in self prompts
Envelope merge for numeric ranges; preserve dissent
Default to conservative, reversible actions when ambiguous
